title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses the report about Aaron Rodgers being "torn" about a return to the Packers next season and what this tells us about their chances to win another Super Bowl based on their current roster. He believes Dak Prescott and the Cowboys are destined to continue disappointing based on this one major reason. He also tells you why he was right about Kevin Durant and wrong about Jimmy Garoppolo. Plus, NFL insider Mike Silver joins the show to give the latest on the standoff between Kyler Murray and the Cardinals ownership. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
